seo.title: Build real-time editing into your React site
seo.description: Open-source editing UI designed for the Jamstack. Write to any backend.

banner.text: Tina Cloud, our headless backend is in public Alpha. Read more

blocks.headline: Unlock your team with *next-gen editing*
blocks.subline: Tina is an open-source editor for Jamstack sites

blocks.headline: Explore thafsdfa asdfe _Tina ecosystem_
blocks.subline: More than just a headless CMS, Tina has all the tools for building web experiences for interdisciplinary teams.

items.headline: Data Source asdf
items.subline: Data Source plugins allow you to extend Tina to connect to different databases and 3rd Party APIs

items.headline: Screen UI Plugins
items.subline: Data Source plugins allow you to extend Tina to connect to different databases and 3rd Party AP

items.headline: Custom Fields
items.subline: Extend primary fields with custom field plugins to completely control the editing experience and functionality.

items.headline: Visual Editing
items.subline: Most CMSs feel like a GUI on a database. Tina gives your team a contextual, intuitive experience.

items.headline: Built for the Jamstack
items.subline: Tina is extensible by design, and already supports React and Next.js based websites.

items.headline: Your Design System & Components asdf
items.subline: Allow your team to pick from your custom, predefined components to build pages.  Maintain a simpler codebase that offers more versatility.

items.headline: Content Backed by Git
items.subline: Tina supports content stored in Git. Give the benefits of version-control to your whole team.

blocks.headline: *Edit Content, Not Code*
blocks.subline: Make changes in context and see them in real-time. Hit save and Tina handles the commit.

blocks.headline: New to Tina?
blocks.subline: Learn the basics of the development workflow
